mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, audit_status, audit_opinion, lecturer_user_no, category_id1, category_id2, category_id3, course_name, course_logo, introduce_id, is_free, course_original, course_discount, is_putaway from springboot2.course_audit where id = #{id}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, audit_status, audit_opinion, lecturer_user_no, category_id1, category_id2, category_id3, course_name, course_logo, introduce_id, is_free, course_original, course_discount, is_putaway from springboot2.course_audit limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into springboot2.course_audit(id,gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, audit_status, audit_opinion, lecturer_user_no, category_id1, category_id2, category_id3, course_name, course_logo, introduce_id, is_free, course_original, course_discount, is_putaway) values (#{id},#{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{statusId}, #{sort}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditOpinion}, #{lecturerUserNo}, #{categoryId1}, #{categoryId2}, #{categoryId3}, #{courseName}, #{courseLogo}, #{introduceId}, #{isFree}, #{courseOriginal}, #{courseDiscount}, #{isPutaway})
mapper.update:
update springboot2.course_audit
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
status_id = #{statusId},
sort = #{sort},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
audit_opinion = #{auditOpinion},
lecturer_user_no = #{lecturerUserNo},
category_id1 = #{categoryId1},
category_id2 = #{categoryId2},
category_id3 = #{categoryId3},
course_name = #{courseName},
course_logo = #{courseLogo},
introduce_id = #{introduceId},
is_free = #{isFree},
course_original = #{courseOriginal},
course_discount = #{courseDiscount},
is_putaway = #{isPutaway},
where id = #{id}
